chunks.original_text: 次重约勅。 重勅臣身中五体真官、官一小吏、十二书佐，严装显服，冠带垂缨，及时操臣拜露真文章表，上诣太上曹，随事进对。 误字为易，脱字为益，若言辞倒错，寻逐治正，必使上合，无令上官有所谴却，六天群魔、下官故炁，断截公文，分别关奏，以时上达，伏须告报。 次起北向，叩齿九通，祝曰： 高上元始，九天灵尊，上真玄遐，道幽琼轩，三五运推，七宿改晨，虚皇控辔，五帝定仙，青宫总绿，符命灵山，是日元吉，万真开陈，上学甲乙，宿命因缘，得遇神经，上皇宝篇，谨於玄岳，上盟九天，下告五帝，十二河源，乞丐记领，奏上高晨，普告万灵，列位皇坛，营卫威式，按如太真，须到明日启传。 次复官。 臣身中功曹使者、箓上将军吏兵、上章之官，效力事讫，还入臣身中，在左还左，在右还右，安隐九宫六府、金堂玉室、十二关机之中，缠身绕骨，经卫百脉。 若有典主保护臣身，直使功曹差次检押，无令错互，须臣后召复出，奉行一如故事。 鸣法鼓三通，咽炁三过。 次起再拜，复炉如法。 毕，师与弟子从地户出。 明日登坛告大盟次第法 平旦言功竟，弟子若多，改坛如前。 用六榜安着五门上，东西南北四门依位各一榜，王门上施戊己、九天二榜，着门之左右也。 诀云：中央门在正门下季上，如春在丑，众真门在正门上孟上，如春在巳，他效之。 如弟子少，即用斋坛，依常黄箓斋法也。 更铺设修饰，严净布置。 升坛所须等物悉具备，鸣钟，法师与弟子临坛。 三师五保，严装法服，弟子皆玄冠黄褐，执简齐肃，香花赞引，悉皆如法。 先引弟子绕坛三匝，至东南角，向西倚，赞唱勿停。 次引师复绕坛三匝，至西北角倚。 师去坛三十步，或七步，便叩齿三十二通，思紫云覆冠。 一坛或一山五帝神兵各十万人，来迎兆身，了了分明，乃祝曰： 神真出游，万帝骇惊，玉虚玄卫，天宿倒倾，五岳司官，莫不辅灵，命召十方，驱策天兵，率天以下，咸到皇庭，令我登仙，洞得道精，审知不祥，通幽究冥，所向所陈，悉合玉清。 毕，乃徐行登坛，从西北天门入户，祝如法。 升都坛左回，向西北九拜，朝九天主讫，叩齿九通，祝曰： 臣甲今传弟子某甲九天宝经，至上玉讳，清斋宿奏，气命合真，乞告下监真玉仙、典录侍郎、卫灵司马，下监盟文，及所启所付，毕得上闻。 〔绕〕坛左行，还向东南，再拜。 又启曰：
chunks.translated_text:
Next, the solemn charge is reiterated.

The true officials of your servant’s five bodily constituents, one minor attendant, and the twelve scribal aides are again commanded to array themselves in full regalia, donning caps and pendent tassels, and to promptly bear your servant’s memorial of true scriptural compositions upward to the *Taishang* court, presenting it in due order. Should any character be miswritten, let it be corrected; should any be omitted, let it be supplied. If words are transposed or disordered, they must be sought out and rectified, ensuring all accords with the highest standard, that no superior office may reject or reprimand. Let the demonic hosts of the Six Heavens and the stagnant *qi* of subordinate offices be severed and intercepted, the memorial distinguished and transmitted, and the report conveyed upward in timely fashion. Await the response in reverence.

Next, rise and face north, striking the teeth nine times, and invoke:

O Exalted Primordial Origin, Numinous Honored One of the Nine Heavens,
Supreme Perfected of the Mysterious Beyond, Jade Pavilion of the Dao’s Depths,
As the Three and Five revolve their courses, the Seven Luminaries alter their dawn,
The Void Thearch reins in the reins, the Five Emperors ordain transcendence.
The Azure Palace gathers the verdant, the talismanic mandate issues from the Numinous Mountain.
On this day of primal felicity, the myriad perfected open their ranks.
The advanced disciples of the cyclical signs *jia* and *yi*,
Bound by karmic affinity from former lives,
Have encountered the divine scriptures, the precious chapters of the August Sovereign.
Reverently, upon the Mystic Peak, they pledge alliance to the Nine Heavens,
Proclaiming below to the Five Emperors and the Twelve River Sources.
Beseeching registration and receipt, they memorialize the exalted court,
Universally notifying the ten thousand numina.
Arrayed in ranks upon the imperial altar,
They marshal and guard the majestic rites, adhering to the standards of the Supreme Perfected.
Await the transmission of the dawn’s initiation.

Next, the officials are dismissed. The *gongcao* messengers within your servant’s person, the generals and soldiers of the register, and the officials of the memorial’s presentation, having fulfilled their duties, return into your servant’s body. Those on the left return to the left, those on the right to the right, securely abiding within the Nine Palaces and Six Treasuries, the Golden Hall and Jade Chamber, and the Twelve Passes and Mechanisms. They coil about the body and entwine the bones, traversing and safeguarding the hundred vessels. Should any overseer be charged with protecting your servant’s person, let the *gongcao* dispatch them in proper sequence, ensuring no error or confusion, until your servant summons them forth again, whereupon they shall act in accordance with precedent.

Sound the ritual drum three times, and swallow the *qi* thrice.

Next, rise and bow twice, then replenish the incense burner as prescribed.

When complete, the master and disciples exit through the Earth Gate. The next day, ascend the altar to perform the great alliance rites in proper sequence.

At dawn, declare the completion of the merit. If the disciples are numerous, alter the altar as before. Use six placards, placing them upon the five gates: one each at the eastern, southern, western, and northern gates according to their positions, and two placards—*wuji* and *jiutian*—at the central gate, affixed to its left and right.

The formula states: The Central Gate lies below the main gate at the *ji* position, as in spring at *chou*; the Gate of the Multitudinous Perfected lies above the main gate at the *meng* position, as in spring at *si*. The rest follow accordingly.

If the disciples are few, use the fasting altar, adhering to the standard *Huanglu* fast rites. Further adorn and purify the arrangements, ensuring all is meticulously prepared. All requisite items for ascending the altar are assembled. Sound the bell, and the Dharma Master with the disciples approach the altar.

The Three Masters and Five Guarantors, arrayed in ritual vestments, and the disciples, all in dark caps and yellow-brown robes, holding tablets, stand in solemn order. The offerings of incense and flowers, the chants and processions, all proceed according to ritual.

First, lead the disciples in circumambulating the altar three times, halting at the southeastern corner, facing west, and chanting without cease. Next, lead the master in circumambulating the altar three times, halting at the northwestern corner.

The master withdraws thirty paces from the altar—or seven paces—and strikes the teeth thirty-two times, visualizing purple clouds veiling his crown. Envision the divine soldiers of the Five Emperors of a single altar or mountain, one hundred thousand each, come to welcome your servant’s person, vivid and distinct. Then invoke:

As the divine perfected set forth on their journey,
The myriad emperors are struck with awe.
The Jade Void’s mysterious guard, the celestial lodges overturn,
The officials of the Five Marchmounts all lend their numinous aid.
Summoned by command, the armies of the ten directions are driven forth,
Leading the hosts of heaven downward, all assemble at the imperial court.
Grant that I may ascend as transcendent, penetrating the essence of the Dao,
Discerning the inauspicious, plumbing the depths of the obscure and hidden.
All that is directed or declared shall accord with the Jade Purity.

When complete, proceed slowly to ascend the altar, entering through the northwestern Celestial Gate. Invoke as prescribed.

Ascend the central altar, circling left to face northwest, and bow nine times toward the Lord of the Nine Heavens. Having completed the obeisance, strike the teeth nine times and invoke:

Your servant *jia* now transmits to disciple *mou jia* the precious scriptures of the Nine Heavens, up to the supreme jade taboo names. Having purified the fast and memorialized in advance, with *qi* and destiny conjoined in perfection, beseech the descent of the supervising perfected jade transcendent, the Attendant Gentleman of the Register, and the Marshal of Numinous Guardians to oversee the alliance text and all that is presented and entrusted, that it may be fully reported above.

Circumambulate the altar to the left, returning to face southeast, and bow twice. Then invoke again:

Celestial Masters, the Female Masters, the Three Master Lords, and the Ladies of their courts.

The twelve scribal attendants handling documents proceed in order, following the memorial’s protocol. Your servant, having reverently received the *Lingbao* Great Dharma, the numinous true writings, the two registers of the *Bajing Neiyin*, and the yellow silk memorial, now places them upon the jade table for perusal.

The exit from the official precinct is complete. Next, the memorial is read aloud.

chunks.original_text: 高上元始天王，今日上愿八会，日吉时清，谨於玄坛，或云岳。 盟度玄经，乞丐告下五帝灵山，监臣盟誓，早赐神仙，得乘飞軿，上升帝晨。 毕，法师倚，次命弟子从东南地户入都坛上，向西北九拜。 竟，师左回立地户上，弟子左回立天门上，回向东南，再拜，还北面南向伏。 师回北向立，叩齿三十六通，诵《金真太空章》一篇，以制万魔。 其辞曰： 天魔乘空发，万精骇神庭。 托化谣歌章，随变入无名。 嚣气何纷纷，秽道当涂生。 云中舍朱宫，北帝踊神兵。 鼓洋自知道，玄运来相征。 上景御飞辔，迅驾检云营。 促校北帝录，收执群魔名。 豁落张天罗，放威掷流铃。 金真辅空洞，玉光焕八冥。 金玄守上宫，神虎戮天精。 剪灭万祆炁，亿亿悉齐平。 上承九天信，啸命靡不倾。 招真究三洞，慧诵朗自清。 八道望玄文，七转纬天经。 混合帝一真，拔度七祖程。 消灭五苦根，反魂更受荣。 金光曜寂室，神烛自然生。 香华散玉宇，烟气彻玉京。 帝遣徘徊辇，三元降绿軿。 迅驾腾九玄，朝我玉皇庭。 毕，便左行，弟子随师从天门入内坛，一云天门入。 左回。 三上五方香，从东始，周竟还西，面向东。 法师闭目，内思存见五脏、五岳、五星、五帝，备卫身中，映盖一体，体作金色，从肺后出，项有圆光如日像，使照明十方，身中了然，尽见内外。 毕。 次诵卫灵神祝曰：
chunks.translated_text:
The Most High Primordial Heavenly King, on this day of supreme vows at the Eighth Assembly, with the day auspicious and the hour pure, reverently at the Dark Altar—or called the Sacred Peak—we transmit the Dark Scripture of Alliance and Ascent, beseeching the descent of the Five Sacred Mountains of the Five Emperors to oversee this servant’s covenant oath, that swiftly the divine immortality be granted, to ride the flying chariot and ascend to the Imperial Dawn.

Having completed this, the Dharma Master leans forward, then commands the disciple to enter the Central Altar from the southeastern Earth Gate, facing northwest to bow nine times. When finished, the Master circumambulates left to stand at the Earth Gate, while the disciple circumambulates left to stand at the Heavenly Gate, turning to face southeast. They bow twice more, then prostrate facing north with heads to the south. The Master turns to face north, strikes the teeth thirty-six times, and recites the *"Golden Perfection, Great Void Chapter"* to subdue the myriad demons. Its words say:

Heavenly demons surge through the void,
Myriad spirits startle the divine court.
Assuming forms in songs and chants,
They shift and enter the nameless.
How clamorous the chaotic *qi*,
Defiling the Way as it arises on the path.
Within clouds they dwell in crimson palaces,
The Northern Emperor deploys his divine troops.
The drum resounds—he knows by nature,
The dark fate comes to summon them.
The Supreme Radiance reins the flying bridle,
Swiftly driving to inspect the cloud encampments.
Urging the Northern Emperor’s records,
Seizing the names of the demon hordes.
The *huoluo* unfurls the celestial net,
Unleashing might to cast the ringing bells.
Golden Perfection aids the empty vastness,
Jade light illumines the eight darknesses.
Golden Mystery guards the Upper Palace,
Divine Tigers slay the celestial essences.
Severing the *qi* of ten thousand evils,
Countless billions all made level.
Upholding the Nine Heavens’ trust,
A single whistle commands all to yield.
Summoning the Perfected to fathom the Three Caverns,
Wisdom’s recitation shines with clarity.
The Eight Paths gaze upon the Dark Text,
Seven revolutions weave the Heavenly Scripture.
Merging with the Imperial Unity’s truth,
Delivering the seven generations of ancestors.
Eradicating the roots of the Five Sufferings,
Returning souls to receive renewed glory.
Golden light blazes in the silent chamber,
Divine candles kindle of themselves.
Fragrant blossoms scatter through the Jade Universe,
Misty *qi* pierces the Jade Capital.
The Emperor dispatches the lingering chariot,
The Three Origins descend in emerald carriages.
Swiftly ascending through the Nine Mysteries,
They come to attend my Jade Emperor’s court.

When finished, they circumambulate left, the disciple following the Master through the Heavenly Gate into the Inner Altar—or called entering through the Heavenly Gate. They circumambulate left. Three times they offer incense to the Five Directions, beginning in the east and circling back to the west, facing east. The Dharma Master closes his eyes, inwardly visualizing and perceiving the five viscera, five sacred peaks, five stars, and five emperors, all guarding within his body, illuminating and covering his form as one. His body becomes golden, emerging from behind the lungs, his neck crowned with a halo like the sun’s image, shining brightly in the ten directions. Within his body, all is clearly seen, inside and out.

Then he recites the invocation to the Guardian Spirits of Numinous Protection, saying:
chunks.overlap_context:
eavens, up to the supreme jade taboo names. Having purified the fast and memorialized in advance, with *qi* and destiny conjoined in perfection, beseech the descent of the supervising perfected jade transcendent, the Attendant Gentleman of the Register, and the Marshal of Numinous Guardians to oversee the alliance text and all that is presented and entrusted, that it may be fully reported above.

Circumambulate the altar to the left, returning to face southeast, and bow twice. Then invoke again:

chunks.original_text: 九炁青天，明星大神，焕照东乡，洞映九门，转烛阳光，扫秽除氛，开明童子，备卫我轩，收魔束祆，上对帝君，奉承正道，赤书玉文，九天符命，摄龙驿传，普天安镇，我得飞仙。 南方丹天，三炁流光，荧星转烛，洞照太阳，上有赤精，开明灵童，总御火兵，备守三宫，斩邪束祆，剪截魔王，北帝所承，风火八冲，流铃交焕，敢有不从，正道流行，我享上功，保天长存，亿劫无终。 七炁之天，太白流精，光曜金门，洞朗太冥，中有素皇，号曰帝灵，保神安镇，卫我身形，断截邪源，王道正明，宫宅整肃，三景齐并，道合自然，飞升紫庭，灵宝符命，普惠万生，功加一切，天地咸宁， 北方玄天，五炁徘徊，辰星焕烂，光曜太微，黑灵尊神，飞玄羽衣，备卫五门，检精捕非，敢有干试，豁落斩摧，玉符所告，神真八威，邪门闭塞，正道明开，映照我身，三光同辉，策空驾浮，举形仙飞。 黄中理炁，总统玄真，镇星吐辉，流焕九天，开明童子，一十二人，元气阳精，焰上朱烟，同照一室，及得我身，百邪摧落，杀鬼万千，中山神咒，普天使然，五灵安镇，身飞上仙。 次叩齿二十四通。 次发炉祝曰： 无上三天玄元始三炁太上老君，召出臣甲身中三五功曹、左右官使者、左右捧香驿龙骑吏、侍香玉童、散花玉女、五帝直符直日香官，各三十六人，出关启此间土地里域真官正神。 臣今正尔烧香传授，愿得太上十方正真生炁降注臣身中，令臣所启速达，径御至真无极道前。 次师引弟子左行，执谒版，西面向东，唱东方天尊，方各三拜。 亦可一拜，亦可不须版，直依方唱。 次南、次西、次北、次束北、交东南、四次西南、次西北、次上方、次下方，具如一文。 臣等至心归命东方无极太上灵宝天尊、苍帝九炁天君、东乡诸灵官。 某帝先生姓氏名再礼谒。 十方并同。 至心归命南方无极太上灵宝天尊、炎帝三炁天君、南乡诸灵官。 至心归命西方无极太上灵宝天尊、白帝七炁天君、西乡诸灵官。 至心归命北方无极太上灵宝天尊、黑帝五炁天君、北乡诸灵官。 至心归命东北无极太上灵宝天尊、梵炁始青天君、东北乡诸灵官。 至心归命东南无极太上灵宝天尊、梵炁始丹天君、东南乡诸灵官。 至心归命西南无极太上灵宝天尊、梵炁始素天君、西南乡诸灵官。 至心归命西北无极太上灵宝天尊、梵炁始玄天君、西北乡诸灵官。 至心归命天门上方无极太上灵宝天尊、玄都玉京金阙七宝玄台紫微上宫三十二天上帝、飞梵大罗天君、真人玉女、上方诸灵官。 至心归命地户下方无极太上灵宝天尊、九土高皇、四司五帝、阴阳水府十二仙官、洞渊洞虚洞元三十六地元皇天君、五岳四渎地上诸灵官。 至心臣谨按太真盟诀斋诀，登坛办具，以昨某时表灵尊文，期诚琼轩，众灵辅位，致使雨寝嘉辰，风息清晷，延兹十天，三炁流光，威式云布，无上开陈。 某甲洪幸，谬兴难克之因，叨冀难成之果，谨依法启传符，自始迄终，得离风雨，使佩受后，愿无踬碍。 各叩头搏颊。 至心次法师就位，东向，弟子还东面，西向伏地。 法师长跪，又叩齿二十四通。 出官。 至心谨出臣身中五体真官功曹吏，出臣身中灵宝洞玄三部八景洞天八府飞天上仙官，各二十四人出。
chunks.translated_text:
Nine Qi of the Azure Heavens, Radiant Star Great Spirit,
Shining upon the eastern quarter, illuminating the Nine Gates,
Turning like a candle’s yang-light, sweeping away filth and dispelling miasma.
Luminous Youths, guard my chamber,
Seizing demons and binding evil,
Ascending to face the Imperial Lord,
Upholding the true Dao, the vermilion script and jade texts,
The talismanic commands of the Nine Heavens,
Summoning dragons to relay the decrees,
Pacifying and securing all under heaven—
Thus may I attain flight as an immortal.

Southern Vermilion Heavens, Three Qi flowing with light,
The Flaming Star turning like a candle, illuminating the Great Yang,
Above dwell the Crimson Essences,
Luminous Youths of numinous clarity,
Commanding the hosts of fire,
Guarding the Three Palaces,
Slaying deviance and binding evil,
Severing the demon kings.
Upheld by the Northern Emperor,
The Eight Thrusts of Wind and Fire,
Interlocking bells resplendent—
Should any dare disobey,
The true Dao flows forth.
I partake of supreme merit,
Preserving heaven’s enduring existence,
For kalpas without end.

Seven Qi of Heaven, the Great White streaming with essence,
Radiance shining upon the Golden Gate, illuminating the Great Darkness.
Within dwells the White Sovereign,
Titled the Imperial Spirit,
Preserving and pacifying the divine,
Guarding my bodily form,
Severing the roots of deviance,
The kingly Dao resplendent in rectitude.
Palaces and dwellings ordered,
The Three Luminaries aligned as one.
The Dao harmonizes with spontaneity—
Ascending to the Purple Court,
The talismanic commands of the Numinous Treasure,
Universally benefiting the ten thousand beings.
Merit extended to all,
Heaven and earth at peace.

Northern Mysterious Heavens, Five Qi circling,
The Morning Star resplendent, shining upon the Supreme Subtlety.
Black Numinous Honored Spirits,
Flying in dark feathered robes,
Guarding the Five Gates,
Inspecting essences and seizing transgressions.
Should any dare test me,
They shall be shattered by the Vast and Falling.
As the jade talismans proclaim,
The Eight Might of the Divine Perfected,
The gates of deviance sealed,
The true Dao brightly opened,
Illuminating my body—
The Three Luminaries shine as one.
Spurring the void, riding the floating,
My form ascends in immortal flight.

Yellow Center governing qi, unifying the Mysterious and True,
The Star of Stability emitting radiance, streaming and shining upon the Nine Heavens.
Twelve Luminous Youths,
Primordial qi and yang essence,
Flames ascending as vermilion smoke,
Together illuminating one chamber,
And thus illuminating my body.
A hundred evils cast down,
Ten thousand ghosts slain.
The divine incantation of Mount Zhong,
Universally enacted under heaven.
The Five Numinous Ones pacified and secured—
My body flies as an immortal on high.

Next, strike the teeth twenty-four times.

Next, recite the incense-burning invocation, saying:
Most High Three Heavens, Primordial Origin, Three Qi, Supreme Venerable Lord Lao,
Summon forth from my body the Three and Five Merit Officers,
The left and right attending messengers,
The left and right incense-bearing dragon-riding couriers,
The Jade Lads attending incense,
The Jade Maidens scattering flowers,
The Five Emperors’ Direct Talisman Officers and Direct Day Incense Officers,
Each thirty-six in number,
To emerge and report to the true officials and divine spirits of this land and domain.

I now, at this moment, burn incense and transmit the teachings,
May the life-breath of the Most High’s Ten Directions and True Perfected Ones descend and infuse my body,
That my supplications swiftly reach the presence of the Utmost True and Boundless Dao.

Next, the Master leads the disciple in circumambulating left, holding the petition tablet, facing west toward the east, and intoning the Heavenly Worthy of the East. Each direction is honored with three bows.
Alternatively, one bow may suffice, or the tablet may be omitted, directly intoning the directions as they face.

Next, the south; then the west; then the north; then the northeast; then the southeast; then the southwest; then the northwest; then the upper direction; then the lower direction—each performed in the same manner.

We, with utmost sincerity, take refuge in the Eastern Quarter’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The Azure Emperor, Nine Qi Heavenly Lord,
And all the numinous officials of the eastern quarter.
[Disciple’s name and lineage] reverently presents this petition.
The same is done for all ten directions.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Southern Quarter’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The Flaming Emperor, Three Qi Heavenly Lord,
And all the numinous officials of the southern quarter.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Western Quarter’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The White Emperor, Seven Qi Heavenly Lord,
And all the numinous officials of the western quarter.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Northern Quarter’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The Black Emperor, Five Qi Heavenly Lord,
And all the numinous officials of the northern quarter.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Northeastern Quarter’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The Brahma Qi, Primordial Azure Heavenly Lord,
And all the numinous officials of the northeastern quarter.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Southeastern Quarter’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The Brahma Qi, Primordial Vermilion Heavenly Lord,
And all the numinous officials of the southeastern quarter.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Southwestern Quarter’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The Brahma Qi, Primordial White Heavenly Lord,
And all the numinous officials of the southwestern quarter.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Northwestern Quarter’s Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The Brahma Qi, Primordial Mysterious Heavenly Lord,
And all the numinous officials of the northwestern quarter.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Heavenly Gate’s Upper Direction, the Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The Jade Capital of the Mysterious Metropolis, Golden Watchtower of the Seven Treasures, Purple Tenuity’s Upper Palace, the Thirty-Two Heavens’ Emperors,
The Flying Brahma Great Luo Heavenly Lords,
The Perfected Ones and Jade Maidens,
And all the numinous officials of the upper direction.

With utmost sincerity, we take refuge in the Earthly Gate’s Lower Direction, the Boundless Most High Numinous Treasure Heavenly Worthy,
The Nine Lands’ Lofty Emperor,
The Four Controllers and Five Emperors,
The Yin-Yang Water Bureau’s Twelve Immortal Officers,
The Cavern Abyss, Cavern Void, and Cavern Origin’s Thirty-Six Earthly Origin August Heavenly Lords,
And all the numinous officials of the earthly direction.

With utmost sincerity, I, your disciple, now follow the covenants of the Supreme Perfected and the precepts of the fast,
Ascending the altar to prepare the offerings.
At the appointed hour yesterday, I presented the memorial to the numinous worthies,
Awaiting with sincerity in the jasper chamber,
The assembled spirits taking their positions.
Thus, the rain has ceased on this auspicious day,
The winds stilled in the clear daylight,
Extending through the Ten Heavens,
The Three Qi streaming with light,
Majestic forms spreading like clouds—
The Most High’s unfolding revealed.

I, [disciple’s name], am most fortunate,
Having rashly initiated this difficult-to-fulfill cause,
Presumptuously hoping for a difficult-to-attain fruition.
Diligently following the Dharma, I transmit the talismans,
From beginning to end,
Free from wind and rain,
That after receiving them,
I may encounter no obstacles.
Each kowtows and strikes the cheeks.

Next, the Dharma Master takes his position, facing east, while the disciple returns to face east, prostrating westward upon the ground.
The Dharma Master kneels lengthily and again strikes the teeth twenty-four times.

Summoning the officials:
With utmost sincerity, I reverently summon forth the true officials of the five organs within my body,
The twenty-four officials of the Numinous Treasure’s Cavern Mystery’s Three Divisions and Eight Effulgences,
The Cavern Heavens’ Eight Palaces and Flying Heavenly Perfected Ones,
Each twenty-four in number, to emerge.

chunks.original_text: 太玄三部洞天八景自然灵宝神仙度命三炁天官朱丹玉女各二十四人出。 太玄三部洞天八景自然灵宝神仙度命七炁天官明石玉女各二十四人出。 太玄三部洞天八景自然灵宝神仙度命五炁天官玄滋玉女各二十四人出。 太玄三部洞天八景自然灵宝神仙度命中央黄上天官灵剑玉女各二十四人出。 太玄三部洞天八景自然灵宝神仙东岳青帝主图飞天吏各二十四人出。 太玄三部洞天八景自然灵宝神仙南岳赤帝主图飞天吏各二十四人出。 太玄三部洞天八景自然灵宝神仙中岳黄帝主图飞天吏各二十四人出。 太玄三部洞天八景自然灵宝神仙西岳白帝主图飞天吏各二十四人出。 太玄三部洞天八景自然灵宝神仙北岳黑帝主图飞天吏各二十四人出。 真仙神官，兵马乘骑，一合屯住臣前后左右，罗列行伍。 自然五色素云映盖身形，流精散炁，布满十方，周天覆地，营卫臣身。 一切严装事讫，正一升玄功曹、通真度命传事飞天使者、五帝直符直事，擎玄空之案，对在臣前，衔臣口中辞语，分别关启上下中央、四面八方天官地神、五岳四渎九江八极名山大泽五帝真官、四司监察、九部考召、玄元始炁甲子诸官君、无穷无极无高无下无深无浅无幽无显无鞅数众真官注炁乾皇、九宫八卦六甲真人、根元本始土地之主、社稷将吏，一时严装，与臣身功曹使者、飞龙驿龙骑、直符直事，上启无上元始太上大道、五老上帝至真大圣尊神玉陛下，十方无极大道道德众圣天尊、太帝、天帝、玄中大法师诸官君。 臣以有幸，宿世因缘，九天之劫，延及今身，遭遇明运，大法流行，得以秽质，参染灵文上清金书三洞宝经。 自叨窃以来，尊仰上法，心希神仙，而精诚浅薄，未能感灵，常恐罪至，沦没九泉。 天慈广大，首领得全，诚宜守短，不敢有言。 今三洞御运，灵宝下教，先度并升，仙官空缺，应须中贤，以充诸天。 臣受法之日，应更度人，先有宿名金格玉录，合真之人，周历八极，从虚无中来。 今有宿命某岳真人某甲，年若干岁，体行真素，骨命合真，已受上法九天灵文。 所参浅狭，未见道源，信向苦至，祈请积年。 今赍金缯法信，求受臣所佩元始五老赤书玉篇真文、金书紫字玉文丹章、二十四真三部八景图神仙乘骑、诸天内音自然玉威策录八字等文，神杖众事，盟命宝经，投诚启诉，九祖为证，誓为身宝，约无愆违。 臣受法禁重，不敢轻宣，备加核实，辞诚愈坚，察其丹心，谓可成就。 既法有开度，不敢闭绝。 辄按《黄箓简文灵仙科品》，与某甲对斋三日，宿露真文，天清地静，四气恬然，不风不扬，应法合真。 今谨依先师旧典，明真大法、玉诀之要，付授某甲身，共登皇坛。 金缯镇灵，谨先拜黄缯赤表一通，上诣九天，表露在玉案上，分别请省。 次读表文， 又叩齿三通，送表。 谨遣臣身中五体仙官乘骑、重勅功曹使者、奏事直符传言书佐，严装显服，冠带垂缨。 及时操臣度道黄缯赤表一通，上诣元始五老上帝、至真大圣尊神御前。 若所言倒错，文字谬误，不依旧法者，愿为随事正定，必使上合，无令上官典者有所谴却。 若有邪魔鬼贼干截公文者，收付所在禁狱，依事治罪。 令臣所上御达，所愿必至，恩惟原理，伏须告报。

True immortals and divine officials, with their armies and mounted escorts, assemble and station themselves before, behind, to the left, and to the right of the minister, arrayed in ordered ranks.
Spontaneous five-colored plain clouds illuminate and canopy their forms, streaming essence and dispersing qi, filling the ten directions, encircling heaven and covering earth, encamping and guarding the minister’s body.
Once all solemn preparations are complete, the Orthodox Unity Ascending Mystery Merit Clerk, the Communicating Perfected Delivering Destiny Transmitting Affairs Flying Celestial Messenger, and the Five Thearchs’ Direct Talisman Direct Attendants, bearing the Mystery-Void’s tablet, stand before the minister, receiving the words from his mouth, distinguishing and transmitting them to the heavenly officials and earthly spirits of the upper and lower, central and four quarters, eight directions, the Five Marchmounts and Four Waterways, Nine Rivers and Eight Poles, famous mountains and great marshes, the Five Thearchs’ Perfected Officials, the Four Offices’ Inspectors, the Nine Divisions’ Examiners and Summoners, the Primordial Yuan Beginning Qi Jiazi Officials, the boundless, limitless, immeasurably high, deep, profound, and manifest, innumerable hosts of Perfected Officials infusing qi into the Celestial August One, the Nine Palaces’ Eight Trigrams’ Six Jia Perfected Persons, the Root Origin Primordial Earth Lords, the Altars and Granaries’ Generals and Clerks—all at once solemnly prepared, together with the minister’s body’s Merit Clerk Messengers, Flying Dragon and Post Dragon Riders, Direct Talismans and Direct Attendants—jointly ascend to address the August Presence of the Supreme Unsurpassed Yuan Beginning Most High Great Dao, the Five Venerables, the Perfected Great Sage Honored Divine Lords, and the Ten Directions’ Boundless Great Dao and Virtue’s Multitudes of Sage Heavenly Worthies, Supreme Thearchs, Heavenly Thearchs, and Great Dharma Masters of the Mystic Center.

By fortunate karmic affinity from past lives, through nine heavens’ kalpas extending to this present body, I have encountered the luminous destiny of this age, when the Great Dharma flows and spreads, allowing this defiled being to partake in the sacred texts of the Upper Clarity Golden Writ and Three Caverns’ Treasure Scriptures. Since presumptuously receiving them, I have revered and aspired to the supreme Dharma, my heart yearning for immortality, yet my sincerity remains shallow and weak, failing to move the numinous. Constantly fearing the advent of transgressions, I dread sinking into the Nine Springs. Heaven’s compassion is vast, and my life has been preserved; I ought to guard my shortcomings and dare not speak further.

Now, as the Three Caverns govern the turning of the Dao, and the Numinous Treasure bestows its teachings below, the prior deliverance and ascension have left celestial offices vacant, requiring worthy ones from the middle realm to fill the heavens. On the day I received the Dharma, I was to deliver others first; those whose names were predestined in the Golden Registers and Jade Records, the perfected ones, have traversed the Eight Poles and come from the midst of emptiness and non-being. Now, there is one whose destiny is predestined: the Perfected Person of Such-and-Such Marchmount, So-and-So, aged such-and-such years, whose embodied conduct is pure and true, whose bones and destiny align with perfection, and who has already received the Nine Heavens’ Numinous Writ of the supreme Dharma. Though his participation has been humble and narrow, he has not yet beheld the source of the Dao; his faith and devotion have been earnest and long-standing. Now, bearing golden silks and Dharma tokens, he seeks to receive the Primordial Beginning Five Venerables’ Vermilion Writ Jade Chapters of the True Text, the Golden Writ Purple Characters’ Jade Text Vermilion Seal Scriptures, the Twenty-Four Perfected Ones’ Three Divisions’ Eight Effulgences’ Charts of Immortals’ Mounted Escorts, the Inner Sounds of the Heavens’ Spontaneous Jade Mighty Command Records of Eight Characters, and other sacred implements—divine staves, covenant texts, treasure scriptures—pledging his sincerity, making supplication, with his nine ancestors as witnesses, swearing to treasure them as his own body, vowing never to transgress.

The prohibitions of the Dharma I have received are weighty, and I dare not lightly proclaim them. After thorough verification, his words and sincerity grow ever firmer; examining his cinnabar heart, I deem him capable of accomplishment. Since the Dharma allows for deliverance, I dare not obstruct it. Accordingly, following the *Yellow Register’s Simplified Writs and Numinous Immortals’ Ordinances and Ranks*, I have fasted with him for three days, revealing the true texts under the open sky, with heaven clear and earth still, the four qi tranquil, no wind stirring, no dust rising—meeting the Dharma and aligning with perfection. Now, reverently adhering to the ancient canons of my former masters, I transmit to So-and-So the essentials of the Illuminating Perfected Great Dharma and Jade Instructions, ascending the August Altar together.

With golden silks to secure the numinous, I first bow and present a scroll of yellow silk with a vermilion memorial, ascending to the Nine Heavens, placing it upon the jade tablet for inspection. Next, I read the memorial text aloud, then strike my teeth three times to dispatch it. I solemnly dispatch the Five Body Immortal Officials and their mounted escorts within my body, the repeatedly commanded Merit Clerk Messengers, the Memorializing Direct Talisman Transmitting Words and Writing Assistants, all solemnly attired in manifest vestments, crowned and sashed with hanging tassels. They promptly carry the minister’s delivered Dao yellow silk vermilion memorial, ascending to the presence of the Primordial Beginning Five Venerables, the Perfected Great Sage Honored Divine Lords.

Should my words be inverted or erroneous, the texts mistaken or deviating from the ancient Dharma, I pray they be corrected and rectified according to the matter, ensuring they align above, without causing the overseeing celestial officials to reject or reprimand. If any demonic spirits, ghosts, or malevolent forces obstruct or intercept the public documents, may they be seized and delivered to the local prisons, punished according to the offense. May what I have presented be conveyed above, and may my wishes surely reach fulfillment. Humbly awaiting your gracious consideration and response, I prostrate myself in anticipation of your decree.

chunks.original_text: 次弟子左转，南向、师左回， 北向、长跪。 鸣鼓三十六通。 太上灵宝无上洞玄法师某甲先生，臣岳甲稽首再礼，谨上请太极典经仙郎、侍经玉郎、监度司马、四司五帝、玉童玉女，手执紫毛之节、十绝灵旛，从万神千真，前吹凤鸣，后奏天钧，烧香散花，一时浮空而降。 天仪罗列，监度盟言。 臣谨因众真仙官、飞龙驿吏，上启太上无极大道、太上大道君、元始五老上帝、灵宝元尊、十方自然至真、四方大圣、金阙上帝、太极真人、太上玄一三真人、清玄众尊琼阙下，臣以下愚，行尸臭肉，宿福愿会，遭遇真经，得奉受大法三洞宝文。 道高理妙，非所任当，夙夜惧惕，形魂无宁。 臣某诚惶诚恐，顿首顿首，死罪死罪。 臣谬忝非分，冒敢献言，伏寻尊经秘重，渊迹洞源，诚非小臣所可揄扬。 且明科典制，五八听传，臣佩法始浅，未宜宣露。 但大会垂周，世运短促，祸福交谢，道须忠贤广加开度，令入法门。 虽今人情浮伪，虚实难明，然至心翘翘，微在可识，勤求款到，不得闭绝。 臣向拜表上闻，谨有某帝真人某甲，体性慈仁，质素竟白，抗心高上，不务荣华，耽虚味真，愿慕神仙，参履上法大乘之教，劝化开度，立德建功，恭勤丹苦，孜孜不倦，钻励积载，志极道源。 今赍金缯宝信，受真之具，誓诉诸臣，九祖为证，求佩灵宝元始五老赤书真文宝符、三部八景二十四真神官吏兵、诸天内音玉字、八威策文神杖众事，如臣所见。 某甲骨性志行，宜合成就，谨依明真旧典，建坛立盟，告誓九天，按科付授。 约为身宝，不得负违，轻泄漏慢，毁本伐宗，生死父母，及得某身，受考风刀，万劫无原。 恩惟太上众尊、十方圣真、四司五帝，昭鉴盟言，谨以启闻，须御奉行。 臣某诚惶诚恐、稽首再拜。 次法师启奉毕，於是起，弟子从师后，三上五方香，从东始，每至一方，辄长跪上香。 周竟，便巡行三匝，散花十方。 于时当诵咏五真人颂诵一篇。 弟子再礼唱善。 太极真人颂曰： 太上大道君，出是灵宝经。 高妙难为喻，犹彼玄中玄。 自然无为道，学之得高仙。 大乎洞虚经，安坐朝诸天。 上宝紫微台，下藏诸名山。 焕烂龙凤文，戢耀在无间。 妙哉太上道，无为常自然。 王侯及凡庶，所贵唯忠贤。 宿命有福庆，卓拔在昔缘。 法师转相授，宝信劫数年。 广念度一切，大福报尔身。 供养必得道，奉行成至真。 大道无彼我，传当得其人。 太上玄一第一真人颂曰： 众妙出洞真，焕烂耀太清。 奉者号仙人，体无永长生。 逍遥戏玄虚，宫殿罗无形。 蒨粲七宝林，晃朗日月精。 龙鳞交横驰，凤凰翔悲鸣。 太上治紫台，众真诵洞经。 揲香稽首礼，旋行绕宫城。 三周归高座，道王为应声。 人主宏至道，天下普安宁。 太上玄一第二真人颂曰： 虚无常自然，强名字大道。 缅邈无边际，众妙归灵宝。 闭眼存至真，精思降十老。 升仙永无为，灵颜常妙好。 渴饮玉池醴，饥食金光草。 静慧度八难，济世诸苦恼。 太上玄一第三真人颂曰： 妙哉灵宝经，太上自然文。 奉者致得仙，号曰真天尊。 受命宣道教，真为超俗才。 事毕升神仙，宫殿治玄台。 时降昆仑山，逍遥憩蓬莱。 太上正一真人三天大法天师颂曰： 灵宝及大洞，至真道经王。
chunks.translated_text:
Then the disciple turns left, faces south, while the master turns left to face north, and kneels lengthily. The drum is sounded thirty-six times.

The Most High Numinous Treasure Supreme Cavern Mystery Master, so-and-so the Master, your servant Yue so-and-so bows twice with head reverently lowered, and respectfully invokes the Celestial Canon Attendant Immortals, the Jade Scribes of the Scriptures, the Supervisor of Ordination Sima, the Four Directors and Five Emperors, the Jade Lads and Jade Maidens—all bearing purple-feathered tablets and tenfold sacred banners, accompanied by ten thousand spirits and a thousand perfected ones, with phoenix flutes sounding before and celestial harmonies played behind, burning incense and scattering flowers, descending together through the void.

Heavenly ranks arrayed, they oversee the covenant of ordination. Your servant, relying on the assembled perfected immortals and flying dragon couriers, humbly addresses the Most High Boundless Dao, the Most High Lord of the Dao, the Primordial Beginning Five Venerables, the Numinous Treasure Primordial Honored One, the Ten Directions’ Spontaneous Perfected, the Four Quarters’ Great Sages, the Golden Watchtower Lord, the Supreme Pole Perfected, the Three Perfected of the Supreme Mystery Unity, and the host of honored ones in the Jade Tower below:

Your servant, a fool of base flesh, has by past merit and destined meeting encountered the true scriptures and received the great Dharma of the Three Caverns’ precious texts. The Dao is lofty, its principles profound—far beyond my capacity. Day and night I tremble in fear, body and soul never at rest. Your servant, in utmost reverence and dread, kowtows again and again, acknowledging my mortal transgressions.

Presumptuously overstepping my station, I dare to present these words. I reflect that the honored scriptures are sacred and weighty, their origins deep and fathomless—truly not something a humble servant may expound. Moreover, the luminous statutes and regulations decree that transmission may only occur after fifty-eight hearings. My grasp of the Dharma is still shallow; I am unworthy to proclaim it openly. Yet as the great kalpa nears its end and the world’s span shortens, fortune and misfortune alternate swiftly. The Dao requires that the loyal and worthy be broadly initiated, that they enter the Dharma gate.

Though the hearts of people today are shallow and deceitful, truth and falsehood hard to discern, yet those who yearn with utmost sincerity—even faintly—may be recognized. Through earnest seeking and sincere devotion, none should be shut out. Having previously submitted a memorial for your celestial attention, I now respectfully report that the Perfected of such-and-such an Emperor, so-and-so, is by nature compassionate and kind, his character pure and unblemished. His aspirations are lofty, unconcerned with glory or splendor. He delights in emptiness and savors the real, longing for immortality. He has followed the teachings of the Great Vehicle of the Supreme Dharma, exhorting and guiding others, establishing virtue and merit. Diligent in alchemical toil, tireless in his devotion, he has drilled and striven for years, his resolve fixed on the source of the Dao.

Now he presents gold, silk, and precious tokens—requisites for receiving the true teachings—and swears before the assembled spirits, with his nine generations of ancestors as witnesses, seeking to bear the Numinous Treasure’s Primordial Beginning Five Venerables’ Red Writ of the True Text and Precious Talismans, the twenty-four Perfected Divine Officials and Soldiers of the Three Divisions and Eight Luminaries, the Jade Scripts of the Inner Sounds of the Heavens, the Eight Might Command Texts, the divine staff, and all other matters as I have observed.

So-and-so’s innate nature and conduct are fitting for accomplishment. Respectfully following the ancient statutes of the Illustrious Perfected, I have established an altar, formed a covenant, and sworn before the Nine Heavens. In accordance with the regulations, I now confer these upon him. Let them be treasured as his own body, never to be betrayed, lightly divulged, or carelessly profaned. To violate this would be to sever his roots and destroy his lineage, to harm the parents who gave him life, and to bring upon himself the trials of the wind-blade and the knife, with no reprieve for ten thousand kalpas.

May the Most High and the host of honored ones, the Ten Directions’ Sacred Perfected, and the Four Directors and Five Emperors witness this covenant. Respectfully submitted for your celestial consideration and enactment. Your servant, in utmost reverence and dread, bows twice with head reverently lowered.

Then the Dharma Master concludes the invocation. Thereupon he rises, and the disciple follows behind the master. Three times they offer incense to the five directions, beginning in the east, kneeling lengthily each time they approach a quarter. When the circuit is complete, they circumambulate three times and scatter flowers in the ten directions. At this time, the Five Perfected Ones’ hymns are chanted in turn. The disciple bows twice and intones the benediction.

**Hymn of the Supreme Pole Perfected:**
The Most High Lord of the Great Dao
Revealed the Numinous Treasure scriptures.
Sublime and wondrous, beyond compare—
Like the mystery within the mystery.
The spontaneous, non-actional Dao,
Studied, leads to lofty immortality.
Vast is the Cavernous Void scripture,
Seated in peace, one may ascend the heavens.
Above, it treasures the Purple Tenuity Terrace;
Below, it conceals itself in famous mountains.
Resplendent with dragon and phoenix script,
Its radiance gleams in the spaceless.
Wondrous is the Most High’s Dao,
Non-actional, ever spontaneous.
Kings, lords, and common folk—
All esteem only the loyal and worthy.
Those with past-life blessings,
Outstanding from former causes,
Receive the Dharma Master’s transmission,
The precious trust for kalpas uncounted.
Broadly mindful of delivering all,
Great fortune returns to your person.
In offering, one attains the Dao;
In practice, one becomes a perfected one.
The Great Dao has no self or other—
Transmission must find the right person.

**Hymn of the Supreme Mystery Unity First Perfected:**
From the Cavern of All Wonders,
Resplendent, it illumines the Great Clarity.
Those who uphold it are called immortals,
Their bodies eternally enduring.
Carefree, they sport in the mysterious void,
Palaces arrayed in formlessness.
Lush are the seven-jeweled groves,
Radiant as sun and moon’s essence.
Dragon scales intertwine in flight,
Phoenixes soar with mournful cries.
The Most High governs the Purple Terrace,
The host of perfected chant the Cavern scriptures.
Burning incense, they bow in reverence,
Circumambulating the palace city.
Three circuits return to the high seat,
The Dao King responds in kind.
When the ruler embraces the supreme Dao,
The world enjoys universal peace.

**Hymn of the Supreme Mystery Unity Second Perfected:**
Emptiness and constancy are spontaneous,
Forcibly named the Great Dao.
Boundless and remote, without limit,
All wonders return to the Numinous Treasure.
Closing the eyes, one contemplates the Perfected;
With concentrated thought, the Ten Elders descend.
Ascending as immortals, forever non-actional,
Their numinous countenances ever wondrous.
Thirst quenched with jade pool nectar,
Hunger sated with golden radiance herbs.
Through stillness and wisdom, the eight perils are crossed,
The world’s myriad sufferings relieved.

**Hymn of the Supreme Mystery Unity Third Perfected:**
Wondrous are the Numinous Treasure scriptures,
The Most High’s spontaneous texts.
Those who uphold them attain immortality,
Called the true Heavenly Honored Ones.
Charged with proclaiming the Dao’s teachings,
Truly they transcend the mundane.
Their work complete, they ascend as immortals,
Their palaces govern the Mystery Terrace.
At times they descend Mount Kunlun,
Carefree, they rest on Penglai.

**Hymn of the Supreme Rectified Unity Perfected, the Three Heavens’ Great Dharma Celestial Master:**
The Numinous Treasure and the Great Cavern—
The king of the perfected Dao’s scriptures.

chunks.original_text: 如有五千文，高妙无等双。 奉行立飞仙，玄居治虚空。 侍卫太上台，逍遥紫微宫。 万劫犹电顷，长存永无穷。 道眼已备足，豁落自冥通。 幽昧无不知，安坐观十方。 诵毕，法师弟子各还复位，南北相对，披真文於案上。 师诵真文序毕，弟子再礼，次依玉诀正音，字字解说，口授读度。 弟子承受诀言，东方安宝华林青灵始老九炁青天赤书真文。 东方赤书玉篇 东方九炁，始皇青天，碧霞郁垒，中有老人，总校图绿，摄炁举仙，岁星辅肝，角亢镇真，氏房心尾，四景回旋，箕主七辰，玉斗明轮，承炁捕非，扫除灾群，东山神咒，摄召九天，赤书符命，制会酆山，束魔送鬼，所诛无镯，悉诣木宫，敢有稽延，下制东河，溟海水神，大劫洪灾，蛟龙负身，水府开道，通径百千，青帝赤文，风火无间。 南方赤书玉篇 南方丹天，赤帝玉堂，中有大神，号曰赤皇，上炎流烟，三炁勃光，神仙受命，应运太阳，荧惑辅心，井鬼守房，柳星张翼，抗御四乡，轸总七宿，回转天常，召运促会，正道驿行，赤文命灵，北摄酆山，束送魔宗，斩灭邪原，符教所诛，明列罪源，南山神咒，威伏万方，群祆灭爽，万试摧亡，南河水帝，太伯龙王，神咒流行，普扫不祥，洪水飞灾，止蛟召龙，开除水径，千道万通，敢有干试，摄送火宫，赤书所告，莫有不从。 中央赤书玉篇 中央总灵，黄上天元，始生五老，中黄高尊，摄炁监真，总领群仙，典录玄图，宿简玉文，催运上炁，普告万神，镇星辅脾，回度北元，魁魁主非，截邪斩奸，魑魉魑魅，扫秽除氛，魒正玄斗，明度天关，九天符命，金马驿传，勅摄北帝，遏塞鬼门，剪除不祥，莫有当前，中山神咒，召龙上云，制会黄河，九水河源，不得殆纵，善恶悉分，千祆万奸，上对帝君，莫有干试，太阳激愤，赤书玉字，宣告普闻。 西方赤书玉篇 西方素天，白帝七门，金灵皓映，太华流氛，白石峨峨，七炁烟煴，上有始生，皇老大神，总领肺黑，主校九天，检定图录，制召上仙，太白检肺，奎娄守魂，胃昴毕觜，主制七关，参总斗魁，受符北元，赤书玉字，九天正文，摄召万炁，普归帝君，西山神咒，八威七传，符水上龙，召山送云，在所校录，同到帝门，辅卫上真，斩灭邪源，若有不祥，截以金关，赤书符命，风火驿传。 北方黑帝赤书玉篇 北方玄天，五炁徘徊，中有黑帝，双皇太微，总领符命，仙炼八威，青裙羽属，龙文凤衣，上帝所举，制到玉阶，北辰辅肾，斗牛卫扉，女虚危室，豁落四开，辟总七星，执凶纠非，却灾扫秽，明道洞辉，北山神咒，激阳起雷，流铃焕落，玃天振威，北酆所部，万祆灭摧，九河倾讫，鸟母群飞，蛟龙通道，水陌洞开，赤文玉书，驿龙风驰。 五魔玉讳 九炁天中空洞青灵魔王，姓巴元，讳丑伯。 三炁天中空洞赤灵魔王，姓负天，讳担石。 中黄高皇天中空洞黄灵魔王，姓横天，讳担力。 七炁天中空洞白灵魔王，姓反山，讳六目。 五炁天中空洞黑灵魔王，姓监丑，讳朗馥。 度上部八景 清微天主上部赤字玉诀

Should there be the Five Thousand Characters,
Lofty and wondrous, peerless in the world.
Those who uphold them ascend as flying immortals,
Their mysterious abodes governing the void.
They attend the Terrace of the Most High,
Carefree, they dwell in the Purple Tenuity Palace.
Ten thousand kalpas pass like a flash of lightning,
Yet they endure eternally without end.
The Dao-eye now fully complete,
Their luminous clarity pierces the hidden depths.
Dark and obscure, nothing remains unknown—
Seated in stillness, they observe the ten directions.

When the recitation concludes, the Dharma Master and disciples return to their positions, facing south and north, unfolding the True Writ upon the altar. The Master recites the Preface to the True Writ, after which the disciples bow again. Then, following the Jade Instructions, they pronounce each character with correct intonation, explaining and transmitting them orally for reception.

The disciples receive the oral instructions and install the Eastern Treasure Floriate Grove’s Azure Numinous First Elder and the Nine Qi Azure Heaven’s Vermilion Writ.

**Vermilion Writ of the Eastern Jade Chapter**
The Eastern Nine Qi, Primordial Sovereign of Azure Heaven,
Verdant mists rise in layered splendor.
Within dwells the Elder,
Overseeing the celestial charts and registers,
Directing qi to elevate immortals.
Jupiter aids the liver,
Horn and Neck stars guard the true,
Root, Chamber, Heart, and Tail revolve through the four seasons.
Winnowing Basket governs the seven luminaries,
The Jade Dipper shines in radiant wheel.
Receiving qi, it captures the false,
Sweeping away calamitous hordes.
The Eastern Mountain’s divine incantation
Summons the Nine Heavens.
The Vermilion Writ’s talismanic command
Restrains and convenes Feng Mountain.
Binding demons and dispatching ghosts,
None it slays escape unscathed—
All are sent to the Wooden Palace.
Should any dare delay,
It commands the Eastern River,
The gods of the briny seas.
In great kalpic floods,
Dragons bear their forms.
The Water Palace opens its paths,
A thousand and ten thousand passages clear.
The Azure Emperor’s Vermilion Writ,
Wind and fire move without cease.

**Vermilion Writ of the Southern Jade Chapter**
The Southern Cinnabar Heaven,
The Vermilion Emperor’s Jade Hall.
Within dwells the Great Spirit,
Named the Vermilion Sovereign.
Flaming mists rise,
Three qi surge with radiant light.
Immortals receive their mandate,
Answering the Great Yang’s movement.
Mars aids the heart,
Well and Ghost guard the Chamber.
Willow, Star, Spread, and Wing
Defend the four quarters.
Chariot governs the seven lodges,
Revolving the celestial constant.
Summoning and hastening their assembly,
The true Dao courses like a courier’s relay.
The Vermilion Writ commands the numinous,
Northward restraining Feng Mountain,
Binding and dispatching demonic clans,
Severing and extinguishing the roots of evil.
Those slain by talismanic decree
Are exposed with their crimes laid bare.
The Southern Mountain’s divine incantation
Subdues all directions with awe.
Hosts of malevolent spirits are obliterated,
Ten thousand trials crushed to naught.
The Southern River’s Water Emperor,
The Great Elder Dragon King,
The divine incantation flows forth,
Universally sweeping away inauspiciousness.
Floods and flying calamities,
Halting dragons and summoning serpents,
Clearing waterways,
A thousand paths and ten thousand passages open.
Should any dare defy,
They are sent to the Fire Palace.
None disobey the Vermilion Writ’s proclamation.

**Vermilion Writ of the Central Jade Chapter**
The Central Axis of Numinous Power,
Yellow Supreme Heaven’s Origin.
First born of the Five Elders,
The Central Yellow’s exalted honor.
Directing qi and overseeing the true,
They govern the hosts of immortals,
Custodians of the mysterious charts,
Keepers of the jade texts in the stellar archives.
Urging the ascent of primordial qi,
They universally proclaim to the myriad spirits.
Saturn aids the spleen,
Revolving through the Northern Origin.
Dipper and Straddler suppress the false,
Severing evil and slaying the treacherous.
Goblins and specters,
Swept away, impurities dispelled.
The Demon-Quelling Straddler and Mysterious Dipper
Illuminate and traverse the Celestial Pass.

Transmitted by the Golden Horse courier.

Shearing away inauspiciousness,

Summons dragons to ascend the clouds,
Restrains and convenes the Yellow River,
The nine watercourses’ sources.

Good and evil are fully distinguished.
A thousand malevolent spirits and ten thousand treacheries,
All face the Imperial Lord.
None dare defy—
The Great Yang’s wrath is roused.
The Vermilion Writ’s jade characters

White Emperor’s Seven Gates.

Commanding and summoning the perfected immortals.

The Vermilion Writ’s jade characters,
The Nine Heavens’ true script.
Summoning the myriad qi,
Universally returning to the Imperial Lord.
The Western Mountain’s divine incantation,
Eight Might and Seven Transmissions.
Talismanic water ascends the dragons,
Summoning mountains and dispatching clouds.

Together arriving at the Imperial Gate.
Aiding and defending the perfected,
Severing and extinguishing the roots of evil.

The Vermilion Writ’s talismanic command,
Transmitted by wind and fire couriers.

Five qi meander in cycles.

The Twin Sovereigns of the Great Tenuity.

Refining immortals with Eight Might.
Azure skirts and feathered retinue,
Dragon-script and phoenix robes.
Raised by the Supreme Emperor,
Their commands reach the Jade Stairs.
The Northern Culmen aids the kidneys,
Dipper and Ox guard the gates.
Maiden, Void, Rooftop, and Encampment
Open the four quarters in luminous clarity.
Straddler governs the seven stars,

Illuminating the Dao with resplendent brilliance.
The Northern Mountain’s divine incantation
Stirs the Yang to raise thunder,

The Heavenly Ape shakes its might.
All under Feng’s dominion,
Ten thousand malevolent spirits crushed to naught.
The nine rivers’ waters overturned,
Bird mothers and their flocks take flight.
Dragons clear the paths,
Waterways open in luminous passage.
The Vermilion Writ’s jade script,
Transmitted by dragon couriers on the wind.

chunks.original_text: 青书玉字，三十二字。 上天虚无，玄洞九五，太上阿房，统灵威户，玉衡摄气，脑华玄睹，统御上部，通神达古。 度中部八景 大赤天主中部赤字玉诀 朱书玉字，三十二字。 赤明开真，三天气和，洞丹阳光，五藏不枯，丹天所宝，朱宫扶苏，纳炼流泉，朱元无徂。 度下部八景 禹余天主下部赤字玉诀 黄书玉字，三十二字。 黄中理气，元生自尊，胃管幽通，六府俱存，白元公子，桃康德淳，养育朱丹，洞神往还。 东方青帝八会内音自然玉字九炁总诸天文 亶娄阿会，无和观音，须延明首，法揽菩昙，稼那阿弈，忽诃流吟，华都曲丽，鲜菩育臻，答落大梵，散烟庆云，飞洒玉都，明魔上门，无行上首，回跖流玄，阿陁龙罗，四象吁员。 诀：东方内音毕，弟子回心，东向伏，冥目。 师叩齿九通，祝曰： 赤明开图，八炁回真，总统玄门，青帝大神，流化九外，缠绵我身，灵音八书，六十四篇，洞明天地，与我合仙，运致龙驾，上升帝轩。 毕，弟子仰头，九咽炁，次读细字，唱度之，横读之也。 南方赤帝八会内音自然玉字三炁总诸天文 南爓洞浮，玉眸诜诜，梵形落空，九灵推前，泽洛菩台，绿罗大千，眇莽九丑，韶谣缘邅，云上九都，飞生自骞，那育郁馥，摩罗法轮，霐持无镜，揽资运容，馥朗廓弈，神缨自宫。 诀：南方内音毕，弟子回心，南向伏，冥目。 师叩齿三通，祝曰： 三炁徘徊，灵凤来飞，玉音八字，焕烂紫微，日吉大庆，我道洞开，朱丹哺饲，仰吸灵辉，生生水火，绛被羽衣，登空玄步，足践凤梯，周旋八天，七祖相随。 毕，弟子仰头三咽炁，次度细字。 西方白帝八会内音自然玉字七炁总诸天文 刀利禅猷，婆泥咎通，宛薮涤色，大眇之堂，流罗梵萌，景蔚肃嵎，易邈无寂，宛首少都，阿滥郁竺，华莫筵由，九开自辩，阿那品首，无量扶盖，浮罗合神，玉诞长桑，栢空度仙。 诀：西方内音毕，弟子回心，西向伏，冥目。 师叩齿七通，祝曰： 七炁金灵，八天尊神，白虎策辈，师子捧辕，七炁缠绵，炼我成仙，身发金光，肺照素云，内外变化，升入洞门，七祖出夜，九幽放魂，三徒五苦，长斩恶根，同欢福舍，受庆自然，亿劫开度，随运长存。 毕，弟子仰头，七咽炁，次度细字。 北方黑帝八会内音自然玉字五炁总诸天文 玃无自育，九日道乾，坤母东覆，形摄上玄，陆罗育邈，眇炁合云，飞天大丑，总监上天，沙陁劫量，龙汉瑛鲜，碧落浮黎，空歌保珍，恶弈无品，洞妙自真，元梵恢漠，幽寂度人。 诀：北方内音毕，弟子回心，北向伏，冥目。 师叩齿五通，祝曰： 玄天徘徊，流景上清，大有启运，八字高明，飞玄澄虚，洞音自生，五炁缠绵，灌我身形，冠带北单，受炼洞灵，肾府化出，内外光精，飞行三界，遨宴紫庭，七祖同庆，欢乐劫龄，七宝林中，反胎更形，长夜灭死，南宫记名，黄箓白简，削死上生。 毕，弟子仰头，五咽炁，次度细字，次读太岁以下盟文。 次度策文 封八威策法，先读弟子名，次读师名。 上版符诀曰： 天灵步兵，太一升天，在地关白，生天命威，命主尸骨，星地命出，月天地度。 又诀曰： 焰明灵威仰，洞浮极炎赤熛弩，通班元成含枢杻，上金昌开曜魄宝，黑节灵会隐侯局。

chunks.original_text: 下版符诀曰： 太上太一版，真经黄帝书。 又诀曰： 慧灵开洪灾度人。 次思前从飞龙，后导天钧，凤啸鸾鸣，十二华光，建三七色节命灵之旛，给五帝玉童玉女各十二人。 五帝侍卫，三界司迎，弟子受策，长跪师前。 勅众符曰： 东流之水，徘徊五城，魄入魂出，澡炼身形，某甲奉受，灵宝众符，永得长生，急急如太上律令。 次封策两头祝曰： 元始太真，五灵高尊，太华皓映，洞朗八门，五老告命，无幽不闻，上御九天，中制酆山，下镇河海，十二水源，八威神咒，灵策玉文，召龙负水，收炁聚云，束魔送鬼，扫荡祆群，万精摧落，所诛无蠲，日月五星，北斗七元，诸天诸地，诸水诸山，玉真所部，溟泠大神，仙王游宴，五帝杖旛，天丁前驱，金虎后奔，玃天猛兽，罗备四门，所呼立到，所召立前，赤书焕落，风火无间，有所摄验，金龙驿传。 祝毕，叩齿九通，仰天三啸，引炁三咽止。 用元始五老印封策毕。 次封杖法，叩齿三十六通，冥目思五帝史，各一人，衣随方色，有五色之光，流焕杖上。 五帝玉女各一人，合共卫杖左右。 毕，先以杖横捧於师前，头向左，此师行之。 次师执青帝符，命弟子看。 诀曰：青帝姓区，名更生。 竟授与弟子，弟子得符，东向叩齿九通，思青炁从口中入注肝中，生九重青华，宝光彻映项后。 毕，还授符与师，师纳上第一孔中。 竟，师祝曰： 无上青精，九炁太灵，神光遐散，流映东青，华景郁勃，灌子身形，宫府安镇，宝魂自生，洞达八朗，飞升玉庭。 毕，弟子引炁九咽止。 次师执赤帝符，命弟子看，诀曰：赤帝姓祝，名昌中。 竟，授与弟子。 弟子得符，南向叩齿三通，思赤炁从口中入注心中，生三重丹华，宝光彻映胸中。 毕，还授符与师，师纳上第二孔前。 竟，师祝曰： 丹华流瑛，宝芝生光，神精彻幽，散灵八方，直符摄炁，啸命朱童，三精焕敷，注子绛宫，赤神安镇，五香溢充，洞映形外，表裹发光，身生水火，独步飞行。 毕，弟子引炁三咽止。 次师执黄帝符，命弟子看，诀曰：黄帝姓司，名精。 竟，授与弟子，弟子得符，向王上叩齿十二通，思黄炁从口中入注脾中，生十二重黄华，宝光洞映一身。 毕，还授符与师。 师纳上第三孔中。 竟，师祝曰： 总元高灵，回神四乡，黄上散华，五帝交芳，流精散漫，十二重光，混合子形，万神相迎，安备黄脾，养炁中房，保龄度劫，永镇无穷。 毕，弟子引炁十二咽止。 次师执白帝符，命弟子看诀曰：白帝姓辱，名曲正。 竟，授与弟子。 弟子得符，西向叩齿七通，思白炁从口中入注肺中，生七重素华，宝光洞映丹田。 毕，还授符与师，师纳上第四孔中。 竟，师祝曰： 金灵七炁，素华流纷，金精童子，道建元巾，带符摄炁，万神会门，宝光弈弈，照子会根，安镇肺华，万劫长存。 毕，弟子引炁七咽止。 次师执黑帝符，命弟子看，诀曰：黑帝姓玄，名尹丰。 竟，授与弟子。 弟子得符，北向叩齿五通，思黑炁从口中入注肾中，生五重玄华，宝光洞映背外。 毕，还授符与师。 师纳上第五孔中。 竟，师祝曰： 北上大玄，五炁徘徊，宝华五重，流光焕辉，灵景郁秀，洞映太微，仰注子身，肾府鲜开，安镇灵宅，万神总归，身生羽翼，举形自飞。

**Lower Tablet Talisman Instructions:**
*"The Supreme Highest’s Tablet of the Grand One,
The True Scripture inscribed by the Yellow Emperor."*

*Further Instructions:*
*"Wisdom-numinous opens the flood’s deliverance of humanity."*

Next, visualize: ahead, soaring dragons lead the way; behind, the Heavenly Chariot guides. Phoenixes cry and simurghs sing, twelvefold radiant splendor. Erect the banner of life’s numinous might, adorned with three-seven colored nodes, and assign twelve Jade Lads and Jade Maidens to each of the Five Emperors. The Five Emperors’ attendants and the Three Realms’ officials welcome the disciple, who receives the memorial, kneeling long before the master.

**Addressing the Host of Talismans:**
*"Waters flowing eastward,
Wandering through the Five Cities,
Souls enter, spirits depart,
Refining the body’s form.
So-and-so, having received
The Numinous Treasure’s host of talismans,
Shall forever attain long life.
Swiftly, swiftly, as the Supreme Highest’s statutes command!"*

Next, seal both ends of the memorial and recite:
*"Primordial Beginning, Supreme Perfection,
Five Numinous Ones of Highest Honor,
Great Flower’s luminous radiance,
Cavern-bright Eight Gates,
The Five Elders proclaim the mandate,
No hidden place unheard.
Above, they govern the Nine Heavens;
At center, they restrain Mount Feng;
Below, they pacify rivers and seas,
The twelve water sources.
Eight Might Divine Incantations,
Numinous Memorials of Jade Script,
Summon dragons to bear water,
Gather qi and assemble clouds,
Bind demons and dispatch ghosts,
Sweep away pernicious hordes.
Ten thousand spirits shattered,
None spared from execution.
Sun, moon, and five planets,
Northern Dipper’s seven origins,
All heavens, all earths,
All waters, all mountains,
Jade Perfected’s legions,
Vast and profound great spirits,
Transcendent Kings’ feasts,
Five Emperors’ staff-banners,
Heavenly Soldiers march ahead,
Golden Tigers rush behind,
Celestial ferocious beasts,
Arrayed at the four gates.
What is called arrives instantly,
What is summoned stands forth at once.
Crimson writs blaze and scatter,
Wind and fire unceasing.
Whatever is seized or verified,
Golden dragons swiftly transmit."*

Recitation complete, strike the teeth nine times, raise the head and roar thrice to heaven, then draw in qi and swallow three times to conclude. Seal the memorial with the Primordial Beginning’s Five Elders’ seal.

**Method for Sealing the Staff:**
Strike the teeth thirty-six times, close the eyes, and visualize the Five Emperors’ scribes—one each—clad in colors matching their directions, their five-colored radiance streaming and illuminating the staff. One Jade Maiden for each of the Five Emperors, together guarding the staff’s left and right.

Complete, first hold the staff horizontally before the master, its head pointing left—this the master performs.

Next, the master grasps the Green Emperor’s talisman and commands the disciple to observe.
*Instructions:*
*"The Green Emperor’s surname is Ou, personal name Gengsheng."*
Having recited this, present the talisman to the disciple. Upon receiving it, the disciple faces east, strikes the teeth nine times, and visualizes green qi entering from the mouth to infuse the liver, where nine layers of green blossoms bloom, their precious light shining through to the nape.

Complete, return the talisman to the master, who inserts it into the first aperture.
Then, the master recites:
*"Supreme Green Essence,
Nine Qi of Great Numinosity,
Divine light spreads afar,
Flowing to illumine the Eastern Green.
Flourishing radiance burgeons,
Irrigating your body’s form.
Palace and bureaus securely pacified,
Precious souls spontaneously arise,
Penetrating the Eightfold Clarity,
Soaring to ascend the Jade Court."*

Complete, the disciple draws in qi and swallows nine times to conclude.

Next, the master grasps the Red Emperor’s talisman and commands the disciple to observe.
*Instructions:*
*"The Red Emperor’s surname is Zhu, personal name Changzhong."*
Having recited this, present the talisman to the disciple. Upon receiving it, the disciple faces south, strikes the teeth three times, and visualizes red qi entering from the mouth to infuse the heart, where three layers of cinnabar blossoms bloom, their precious light shining through the chest.

Complete, return the talisman to the master, who inserts it into the second aperture.
Then, the master recites:
*"Cinnabar blossoms stream like jade,
Precious mushrooms glow with light.
Divine essence penetrates the hidden,
Dispersing numinous power to the eight directions.
The Straight Talisman seizes qi,
Roaring commands to the Vermilion Lads.
Threefold essence unfurls,
Infusing your Crimson Palace.
Red spirits securely pacified,
Five fragrances overflowing,
Luminous within and without,
Body and interior radiant.
Body generates water and fire,
Strolling alone in flight."*

Complete, the disciple draws in qi and swallows three times to conclude.

Next, the master grasps the Yellow Emperor’s talisman and commands the disciple to observe.
*Instructions:*
*"The Yellow Emperor’s surname is Si, personal name Jing."*
Having recited this, present the talisman to the disciple. Upon receiving it, the disciple faces the Center, strikes the teeth twelve times, and visualizes yellow qi entering from the mouth to infuse the spleen, where twelve layers of yellow blossoms bloom, their precious light illuminating the entire body.

Complete, return the talisman to the master, who inserts it into the third aperture.
Then, the master recites:
*"Supreme Origin’s High Numinosity,
Spirit turns to the four quarters.
Yellow radiance scatters blossoms,
Five Emperors’ fragrances intermingle.
Flowing essence disperses,
Twelvefold layered light,
Blending with your form,
Ten thousand spirits welcome you.
Securely arrayed in the Yellow Spleen,
Nurturing qi in the Central Chamber,
Preserving lifespan through kalpas,
Eternally pacified without end."*

Complete, the disciple draws in qi and swallows twelve times to conclude.

Next, the master grasps the White Emperor’s talisman and commands the disciple to observe.
*Instructions:*
*"The White Emperor’s surname is Ru, personal name Quzheng."*
Having recited this, present the talisman to the disciple. Upon receiving it, the disciple faces west, strikes the teeth seven times, and visualizes white qi entering from the mouth to infuse the lungs, where seven layers of white blossoms bloom, their precious light illuminating the cinnabar field.

Complete, return the talisman to the master, who inserts it into the fourth aperture.
Then, the master recites:
*"Seven Qi of Golden Numinosity,
White blossoms streaming in profusion.
Golden essence lads,
Dao established in primordial headscarves.
Bearing talismans to seize qi,
Ten thousand spirits gather at the gate.
Precious light resplendent,
Illuminating your meeting root.
Securely pacified in the Lung Blossom,
Abiding through ten thousand kalpas."*

Complete, the disciple draws in qi and swallows seven times to conclude.

Next, the master grasps the Black Emperor’s talisman and commands the disciple to observe.
*Instructions:*
*"The Black Emperor’s surname is Xuan, personal name Yin Feng."*
Having recited this, present the talisman to the disciple. Upon receiving it, the disciple faces north, strikes the teeth five times, and visualizes black qi entering from the mouth to infuse the kidneys, where five layers of mysterious blossoms bloom, their precious light illuminating the back’s exterior.

Complete, return the talisman to the master, who inserts it into the fifth aperture.
Then, the master recites:
*"Northern Supreme Great Mystery,
Five Qi wandering in cycles.
Five layers of precious blossoms,
Flowing light blazing with radiance.
Numinous splendor lush and elegant,
Illuminating the Grand Tenuity.
Raised to infuse your body,
The kidney palace freshly opened.
Securely pacified in the numinous abode,
Ten thousand spirits wholly return.
Body sprouts feathered wings,
Form lifts and flies of itself."*

chunks.original_text: 毕，弟子引炁五咽止。 次纳符竟，以朱蜡封杖两头空处，上用元始之章印之，下以五老之章印之。 毕，弟子叩齿三十六通，思五帝直符吏各一人，衣随方有五色之光，流焕杖上； 五帝玉女各一人，合共卫杖左右。 弟子依前横捧杖。 师祝之曰： 太阳之山，元始上精，开天张地，甘竹通灵，直符守吏，部御神兵，五色流焕，朱火金铃，辅翼上真，出幽入冥，招天天恭，摄地地迎，指鬼鬼死，祆魔束形，灵符神杖，威制百精，兴摄群方，与我俱生，万劫之后，以代我形，景为五解，神升上清，承符告命，靡不敬听。 毕，引五方炁二十五咽，止。 次师告丹水文 某岳先生大洞法师臣某甲，告弟子某甲等：元始天尊於眇莽之中，敷演真文，结成妙经。 劫劫济度，无有穷已，如尘沙巨亿无绝。 灵文隐奥，秘于金阁，众真宗奉，诸天所仰。 逮于赤鸟，降授仙公，灵宝妙经，於是出世度人。 吾谬禀微缘，运值灵文，先师显饰，奉传至法，誓为身宝，岂敢宣泄。 劫运推移，其法应行，有合真之人，依科听付。 今誓九天，启付某甲，受经之后，当依明科，肃己励躯，精诚勤苦，断绝世缘，唯志大乘，供养朝礼，讲习妙赜，参问有道，导引精研，修斋服御，希求飞腾，尊道敬师，推祟根本，不得唝嗃，有面无心，攻伐本根，自造无端。 轻慢经宝，皮好胎诞，淫欲贪着，嫉妒恚恨，胸心谄楚，怀毒在内，一旦犯违，身充三泉。 当以某甲三曾五祖，同沦地岳，万劫无原。 今建立黄坛，关盟五帝，付授宝文十部妙经，诸天五岳，咸对盟文，检行慎法，抱於中心，飞仙可期，终成道真，善自肃励，如四极明科律文。 次弟子自盟文 某府县乡里某岳先生洞玄弟子某甲，稽首再拜，上启元始天尊、太上道君、十方尊神、四方已得道至真。 太上灵宝三十六部尊经宝符，高玄大法师某，因缘宿福，九天之劫，轮转不灭，庆祚所逮，轮化所籍，得生法门。 先缘发愿，仰羡至阀，法板大乘，心神欣踊，自恐腐骸。 今遭天运推移，皇道数行，蒙法师某甲所见拔擢，开导愚蒙，赐臣灵文，奉对圣君。 肉尸惶惧，洗除浊秽，得侍灵坛，俯荷拔擢，荣过分表。 某当励己肃体，供养尊礼，弃情退累，志托幽阜，长乖世涂，唯志丘岩，昼夜朝拜，思竭愚管，庶凭圣文，拔度朽骸，至心悾慊，无有二念，不敢违盟负誓，欺师慢道，有面无心，不保劫数。 某自收罪考，吞声敢言，引某七世父母、九玄祖考，以为证誓，见世生人、九族种亲以为盟约。 某自乐仙道，时不敢拘迫，一日有违，生死同沦地岳五道，不敢蒙原。 上告元始，下誓五帝，身对师宝，自立盟誓。 丹情至心，唯蒙矜纳。 臣某诚惶诚恐，稽首再拜。 次师起立北向，左手执真文二录。 弟子长跪，以右手持信物，师叩齿三十六通，存五藏之色，令备具合成宝盖之云罗，覆经及师。 从而祝曰： 天书简不烦，道德自备足，修之必神仙，当复何所欲，文耀太无间，焕然而朗郁，传授悉依法，泄慢堕地狱。 次弟子跪，九拜，三起三伏，奉受真文，带策执杖，礼十方一拜。 从北方始，东回而周讫。 想见太上真形如天尊象矣。 毕，次师起巡行，咏步虚。 其辞日： 稽首礼太上，烧香归虚无。 流明随我回，法输亦三周。
chunks.translated_text:
Complete, the disciple draws qi and swallows it five times to conclude.
Next, after inserting the talisman, seal both hollow ends of the staff with red wax. Above, impress it with the seal of the Primordial Beginning; below, impress it with the seal of the Five Elders.
Complete, the disciple strikes the teeth thirty-six times and visualizes the Five Emperors’ Direct Talisman Officers, each clad in robes of their directional color, their five-hued radiance flowing and blazing upon the staff. The Five Emperors’ Jade Maidens, one each, together guard the staff on left and right.
The disciple, as before, holds the staff horizontally across the chest.
The master recites:
*"Mountain of Grand Yang,
Primordial essence of the Highest Beginning,
Opening heaven and unfurling earth,
Sweet bamboo channels the numinous.
Direct Talisman Officers, guarding clerks,
Commanding divine soldiers,
Five colors flowing and blazing,
Crimson fire and golden bells,
Assisting and winging the Highest Perfected,
Exiting darkness and entering shadow,
Summoning Heaven-Heaven’s reverence,
Seizing Earth-Earth’s welcome,
Pointing at ghosts—ghosts die,
Demonic rebels bound in form.
Numinous talisman, divine staff,
Mightily subduing the hundred spirits,
Rising to seize all directions,
Born with me in life,
After ten thousand kalpas,
To replace my form.
Radiance becomes the Five Liberations,
Spirit ascends to Highest Clarity.
Receiving the talisman and proclaiming the mandate,
None dare disrespect or fail to heed."*

Complete, draw the qi of the five directions and swallow it twenty-five times to conclude.
Next, the master proclaims the Cinnabar Water Text:
*"Great Cavern Master of Such-and-Such Peak, your servant So-and-So, proclaims to disciples So-and-So and others:
The Primordial Heavenly Worthy, within the boundless vastness, unfolded and expounded the true writ, weaving it into wondrous scriptures. Kalpa after kalpa, salvation and deliverance know no end, like the dust and sands of measureless eons without cease. The numinous writ, profound and recondite, is secreted within the Golden Pavilion, revered by the host of perfected, looked up to by all heavens. In the era of the Red Bird, it was bestowed upon the Immortal Duke, and the wondrous scriptures of the Numinous Treasure thus emerged to deliver humankind.
I, by humble karmic affinity, have encountered this numinous writ. My former master, in manifest adornment, transmitted the supreme Dharma, which I vowed to treasure as my own body—how dare I presume to divulge it? Yet as kalpas turn and fortunes shift, the Dharma’s time has come to spread. To those who harmonize with the real, I transmit it in accordance with the statutes.
Today, I swear before the Nine Heavens to bestow it upon So-and-So. After receiving the scriptures, you must follow the luminous statutes: purify yourself, discipline your body, devote yourself with diligence and sincerity, sever worldly ties, and aspire solely to the Great Vehicle. Make offerings, perform reverent rites, study the wondrous and abstruse, inquire of those accomplished in the Dao, practice guiding and refining, observe purification fasts and wear ritual vestments, and seek to ascend in flight. Honor the Dao and revere your master, esteeming the root above all. You must not be insincere, all face and no heart, nor assail your own foundation, nor fabricate groundless faults. Do not slight the scriptural treasures, nor indulge in superficial admiration, nor wallow in lust and greed, nor harbor jealousy, anger, or resentment. Do not be deceitful in heart, nor nurse malice within. Should you violate these precepts even once, your body will fill the Three Springs.
You, So-and-So, along with your three progenitors and five ancestors, shall together sink into the earthly prisons, without reprieve for ten thousand kalpas.
Today, I establish the Yellow Altar, ally with the Five Emperors, and transmit the precious writ of the Ten Sections of Wondrous Scriptures. All heavens and the Five Peaks stand witness to this covenant. Examine your conduct, uphold the Dharma with care, and hold it fast in your heart. Flight as an immortal may then be expected, and you shall ultimately attain the perfection of the Dao. Discipline yourself earnestly, as prescribed in the statutes of the Four Poles."*

Next, the disciple’s own covenant text:
*"Disciple So-and-So of the Cavern Mystery, from Such-and-Such Prefecture, County, Village, and Hamlet, prostrates and bows twice, reverently addressing the Primordial Heavenly Worthy, the Most High Dao Lord, the Venerable Divinities of the Ten Directions, and the Perfected of the Four Quarters who have already attained the Dao.
The precious talismans of the Thirty-Six Sections of the Most High Numinous Treasure’s venerable scriptures, and the Great Cavern Master So-and-So, by karmic affinity and accumulated merit, through the kalpas of the Nine Heavens, have revolved unceasingly. Blessed by fortune’s reach and transformed by the wheel of rebirth, I was born into the Dharma gate. By former vows, I aspired to the loftiest lineage, the great vehicle of the Dharma’s board, my spirit exultant, fearing only the decay of this fleshly frame.
Now, as heavenly fortunes shift and the imperial Dao’s destiny unfolds, I have been graciously uplifted and enlightened by Master So-and-So, who has opened my ignorant mind and bestowed upon me the numinous writ, allowing me to serve before the sagely lord. My mortal body trembles with awe, having washed away defilement and filth, and now attending the numinous altar. I bow in gratitude for this elevation, a glory beyond my due.
I vow to discipline myself and purify my body, to make offerings and revere the honored rites, to cast off worldly entanglements and retire to secluded heights, to forever forsake the paths of the world and dwell only among hills and crags. Day and night, I shall prostrate in worship, striving to exhaust my humble capacities, hoping to rely on the sagely writ to deliver this decaying frame. With utmost sincerity and single-minded devotion, I shall harbor no second thoughts. I dare not violate this covenant or betray my oath, nor deceive my master or slight the Dao, nor be all face and no heart, nor fail to preserve the kalpas.
I, having gathered my transgressions and swallowed my voice, dare to speak thus, invoking my seven generations of parents and ninefold ancestors as witnesses to this oath, and all living kin of my nine clans as guarantors of this covenant.
I delight in the immortal’s path and dare not be constrained by time. Should I violate this even for a day, may my life and death alike sink into the earthly prisons of the Five Paths, and may I never be pardoned.
Above, I proclaim to the Primordial Beginning; below, I swear before the Five Emperors. Before the master’s treasure and my own body, I establish this covenant oath. With cinnabar sincerity and utmost devotion, I humbly beg for your compassionate acceptance.
Your servant So-and-So, with reverence and awe, prostrates and bows twice."*

Next, the master rises and faces north, holding the two copies of the true writ in his left hand.
The disciple kneels, holding the token of faith in his right hand. The master strikes his teeth thirty-six times and visualizes the colors of the five viscera, fully arrayed to form a canopy of precious clouds, covering the scriptures and the master.
He then recites:
*"The celestial writ’s simplicity is not burdensome,
The Dao and virtue are complete of themselves.
Cultivate them, and you shall surely become an immortal—
What more could you desire?
The text shines in the Grand Interstice,
Resplendent and radiant.
Transmit and receive it strictly by the Dharma;
To divulge or slight it is to fall into hell."*

Next, the disciple kneels, performs nine bows, rising and prostrating three times, and receives the true writ. Girding the sash and grasping the staff, he bows once to each of the ten directions, beginning in the north and circling eastward to complete the circuit.
He visualizes the Most High’s true form, like the Heavenly Worthy’s image.
Complete, the master rises and paces in procession, chanting the *Step of Emptiness*:
*"Prostrating, I bow to the Most High,
Burning incense, I return to emptiness.
Luminous radiance follows my turning,
The Dharma wheel likewise circles thrice."*

chunks.original_text: 玄愿四大兴，灵庆及王侯。 七祖生天堂，煌煌曜景敷。 啸歌观大漠，天乐适我娱。 齐馨无上德，下仙不与俦。 妙想明玄觉，诜诜乘虚游。 旋行蹑云纲，乘虚步玄纪。 吟咏帝一尊，百关自调理。 俯命八海童，仰携高仙子。 诸天散香华，翛然灵风起。 宿愿定命根，故致高摽拟。 观乐太上前，万劫犹未始。 嵯峨玄都山，十方宗皇一。 岧岧天宝台，光明焰流日。 炼灿玉林华，蒨粲曜珠实。 常念餐元精，炼液固形质金光散紫微，窈窕大乘逸。 俯仰存太上，华景秀丹田。 左顾提郁仪，右盻携结璘。 六度冠梵行，道德随日新。 宿命积福应，闻经若至亲。 天挺超世才，乐诵希微篇。 冲虚太和炁，吐纳流霞津。 胎息静百关，寥寥究三便。 泥丸洞明景，遂成金华仙。 魔王敬受事，故能朝诸天。 皆从斋戒起，累功结宿缘。 飞行凌太虚，提携高上人。 控辔适十方，旋憩玄景阿。 仰观劫刃台，俯盻紫云罗。 逍遥太上京，相与坐莲华。 积学为真人，恬然荣卫和。 永享无期寿，万椿携奚足多。 大道师玄寂，升仙友无英。 公子度灵符，太一奉洞章。 舍利曜金姿，龙驾欻来迎。 天尊盻云舆，飘飘乘虚翔。 香花若飞雪，纷霭茂玄梁。 头脑礼金阙，携手邀玉京。 骞树圆景园，焕烂七宝林。 天兽三百名，师子巨万寻。 飞龙踯躅吟，神凤应节鸣。 灵风扇奇华，清香散人衿。 自无高仙才焉能耽此心。 严我九龙驾，乘虚以逍遥。 八天如指堂，六合何足辽。 众仙诵洞玄，太上唱清谣。 香花随风散，玉音成紫霄。 五苦一时迸，八难顺经寥。 妙哉灵宝囿，兴此大法桥。 天真帝一宫，蔼蔼冠耀灵。 流焕法轮纲，旋空入无形。 虚皇村云璈，众真诵洞经。 高仙凛手赞，弥劫保利贞。 至真无所待，时或辔飞龙。 长斋会玄都，鸣玉叩琼钟。 十华诸仙集，紫烟结成宫。 宝盖罗太上，真人把芙蓉。 散花陈我愿，握节征魔王。 法鼓会群仙，灵唱靡不同。 无可无不可，思与希微通。 次北向，诵礼经颂三首。 其辞曰： 乐法以为妻，爱经如珠玉。 持戒制六情，念道遣所欲。 淡泊正炁停，萧神静默。 天魔并敬护，世世受大福。 郁郁家国盛，济济经道兴。 天人其愿，缥缈入大乘。 因心立福田，靡靡法轮升。 七祖生天堂，我身白日腾。 大道洞玄虚，有念无不契。 炼质入仙真，遂成金刚体。 超度三界难，地狱五苦解。 悉归太上经，静念稽首礼。 每诵步虚一首讫，弟子唱善散花，礼一拜毕，唱三礼曰： 至心稽首礼太上无极大道。 至心稽首礼三十六部尊经。 至心稽首礼玄中大法师。 次平坐，弟子向师伏，师说元始禁戒，弟子句句唱诺，弟子某甲自称名，师告：弟子唱诺三言之。 《元始赤书五篇真文》，上清自然之书，九天始生之灵空洞之章，成天立地，开张万真，安神镇灵，生成兆民，匡御运度，保天长存。 上制天机，中检五灵，下策地祇，啸命河源，运役阴阳，召神使仙。 此至真之文，妙应自然，致天高澄，使地固安，五岳保镇，万品存焉。 元始刻题上帝灵都之馆，累经劫运，而其文保固天根，无有毁沦，与运推迁，混之不浊，秽之愈清，毁之不灭，灭之极明。 大有之文，天真所尊，自非勒名帝图，刻简来生者，斯文隐秘，莫得窥闻。 有得之子，与三炁长存，勤行其法，克致神仙。
chunks.translated_text:
The mystic vow arises in the four directions,
Auspicious blessings reach kings and lords.
Seven generations ascend to heaven’s halls,
Resplendent, their radiance spreads wide.
Whistling songs survey the vast desert,
Heavenly music delights my joy.
In unison, we offer the supreme virtue’s fragrance,
Lesser immortals cannot compare.
Wondrous thoughts illumine the profound awakening,
In throngs, they ride the void in flight.
Turning, they tread the cloud-net’s threads,
Mounting the void, they pace the mystic register.
Chanting praises to the Emperor of Unity,
A hundred passages self-regulate.
Bowing, they command the Eight Seas’ youths,
Gazing upward, they grasp the lofty immortals’ hands.
The heavens scatter fragrant blossoms,
A subtle, numinous wind arises.
Long-held vows root destiny’s core,
Thus attaining lofty eminence.
Beholding the music before the Most High,
Even ten thousand kalpas seem unbegun.
Towering, the Mystic Capital’s peaks,
The ten directions revere the August One.
Soaring, the Heavenly Treasure Terrace,
Its radiance flames like streaming sunlight.
Refining brilliance in jade-forest blossoms,
Vivid hues gleam like pearls’ essence.
Ever mindful to feast on primordial essence,
Refining fluids to solidify form and substance.
Golden light scatters through the Purple Tenuity,
Graceful, the Great Vehicle’s ease.
Looking up and down, I hold the Most High in mind,
Luminous splendor adorns the cinnabar field.
Glancing left, I grasp the Dark Standard,
Turning right, I take hold of the Knotted Brilliance.
The Six Perfections crown the brahmic practice,
Virtue and power renew with the sun.
Karmic fortune from past lives ripens,
Hearing the scriptures as if kin.
Heaven-endowed with transcendent talent,
Delighting in reciting the subtle and minute.
Embracing emptiness, the Great Harmony’s qi,
Exhaling and inhaling the flowing rosy mist.
Embryonic breathing stills a hundred passages,
In solitude, I fathom the three conveniences.
The Mud-Pill Palace gleams with bright radiance,
Thus becoming a Golden Flower immortal.
The Demon King reverently receives his charge,
Thus able to ascend and pay homage to the heavens.
All begins with fasting and precepts,
Accumulating merit to bind past-life affinities.
Soaring flight traverses the Great Void,
Uplifting the loftiest adepts.
Guiding the reins to the ten directions,
Circling to rest on the Mystic Radiance’s slopes.
Gazing up at the Kalpa-Blade Terrace,
Looking down upon the Purple Cloud Net.
Carefree in the Most High’s capital,
Together we sit upon lotus blossoms.
Through accumulated study, one becomes a perfected person,
Serene, the constructive and protective qi harmonize.
Eternally enjoying boundless longevity,
Ten thousand cedars—what abundance could compare?
The Great Dao’s master is profound stillness,
Ascending immortals befriend the peerless.
The noble scion transmits the numinous talisman,
The Great One upholds the cavernous scriptures.
Śarīra radiates golden splendor,
Dragon-drawn chariots suddenly arrive to welcome.
The Heavenly Worthy gazes from the cloud carriage,
Floating, floating, soaring through the void.
Fragrant blossoms like flying snow,
Swirling mists luxuriate on the mystic beams.
Bowing my head, I pay homage at the Golden Portal,
Hand in hand, we invite each other to the Jade Capital.
The Kien Tree’s Round Radiance Garden,
Resplendent, the Seven Treasures’ Grove.
Three hundred named celestial beasts,
Lions vast as ten thousand fathoms.
Flying dragons pace and chant,
Divine phoenixes sing in rhythm.
A numinous wind fans wondrous blossoms,
Pure fragrance scatters upon my lapels.
Without transcendent talent, how could one indulge this heart?
I adorn my nine-dragon chariot,
Mounting the void to roam carefree.
The eight heavens are like a hall at fingertip’s reach,
The six directions—how could they be distant?
All immortals recite the Cavernous Mystery,
The Most High sings a pure melody.
Fragrant blossoms scatter with the wind,
Jade tones form in the purple clouds.
The Five Sufferings all at once disperse,
The Eight Difficulties follow the scriptures’ emptiness.
Wondrous indeed, the Numinous Treasure’s preserve,
Raising this great Dharma bridge.
The Heavenly Perfected’s Palace of the Emperor of Unity,
Lush, it crowns the radiant numen.
Flowing brilliance, the Dharma wheel’s net,
Turning through space, entering formlessness.
The Void Sovereign’s village-cloud zither,
All perfected ones recite the cavernous scriptures.
Lofty immortals, solemn, join hands in praise,
Through endless kalpas, they preserve integrity.
The supremely perfected await nothing,
At times, they rein flying dragons.
Long fasts convene in the Mystic Capital,
Jade chimes strike the jasper bells.
The Ten Blossoms’ immortals assemble,
Purple mists congeal into a palace.
Jeweled canopies array before the Most High,
Perfected persons grasp lotuses.
Scattering blossoms, I declare my vow,
Grasping the tally, I subdue demon kings.
Dharma drums summon the assembled immortals,
Numinous chants resound in unison.
Nothing to be done, nothing not to be done,
Thoughts commune with the subtle and minute.

Then, facing north, he recites three hymns of reverence. Their words say:

*"Delighting in the Dharma as my wife,
Cherishing the scriptures like pearls and jade.
Upholding precepts to restrain the six passions,
Mindful of the Dao, I dispel desires.
Serene, the upright qi abides,
The numinous spirit, still and silent.
Heavenly demons all revere and protect,
Lifetimes receive great blessings.
Flourishing, the household and kingdom prosper,
Thriving, the scriptures and Dao arise.
May heaven and humankind fulfill their vows,
Ethereally entering the Great Vehicle.
Establishing a field of merit through intention,
The Dharma wheel ascends, vast and boundless.
Seven generations ascend to heaven’s halls,
My body ascends at daylight.
The Great Dao pervades the cavernous void,
With mindfulness, nothing fails to align.
Refining form to enter immortal truth,
Thus becoming a vajra body.
Transcending the three realms’ difficulties,
Dissolving the Five Sufferings of hell.
All return to the Most High’s scriptures,
In stillness, I bow my head in homage."*

After each recitation of a *Step of Emptiness* hymn, the disciple chants "Excellent!" and scatters blossoms, bows once, and completes the rite by chanting the Three Reverences:

*"With utmost sincerity, I bow my head in homage to the Most High, Boundless Great Dao.
With utmost sincerity, I bow my head in homage to the thirty-six revered scriptures.
With utmost sincerity, I bow my head in homage to the Great Dharma Master of the Mystic Center."*

Then, sitting evenly, the disciple prostrates before the master. The master recites the *Primordial Beginning’s Prohibitions and Precepts*, and the disciple responds with assent to each phrase, declaring his name: "Disciple So-and-so." The master instructs, and the disciple responds three times with assent.

The *Primordial Beginning’s Red Writ of the Five Tablets* is the scripture of the Highest Clarity’s spontaneity, the numinous, cavernous chapters of the Nine Heavens’ inception, establishing heaven and earth, unfolding the myriad perfected, pacifying spirits and settling numina, engendering and completing the multitudes, rectifying and governing the cosmic rhythm, preserving heaven’s eternal endurance. Above, it regulates celestial mechanisms; at the center, it inspects the five numina; below, it reins the earthly deities. Whistling, it commands the river’s source, directs and employs yin and yang, summons spirits and dispatches immortals. This most perfected writ, wondrously responsive to spontaneity, causes heaven’s heights to clear, the earth to stand firm, the Five Peaks to secure their guardianship, and the ten thousand kinds to endure. The Primordial Beginning inscribed it in the Numinous Capital’s palace. Through countless kalpas, its text remains steadfast at heaven’s root, never decaying or sinking. With the cosmic rhythm, it shifts yet remains unstained; defiled, it grows ever purer; destroyed, it does not perish; extinguished, it shines most brightly. This writ of the Great Existence is revered by the heavenly perfected. Unless one’s name is recorded in the imperial register and inscribed on the tablets of future lives, this text remains hidden and secret, beyond the reach of prying eyes. Those who obtain it abide with the Three Qi eternally. Diligently practicing its methods, they attain immortality.
chunks.overlap_context:
receives the true writ. Girding the sash and grasping the staff, he bows once to each of the ten directions, beginning in the north and circling eastward to complete the circuit.
He visualizes the Most High’s true form, like the Heavenly Worthy’s image.
Complete, the master rises and paces in procession, chanting the *Step of Emptiness*:
*"Prostrating, I bow to the Most High,
Burning incense, I return to emptiness.
Luminous radiance follows my turning,
The Dharma wheel likewise circles thrice."*
